options.responseText: Aw, thanks, sweetheart! These bad boys could probably power the whole vault if we hooked them up right. But if we did that, there'd be a blackout from everyone trying to plug in at once.

followUpOptions.optionText: Can I get a hands-on demonstration of this power source?
followUpOptions.failedCheckResponse: Ha! Nice try, but this power grid's off-limits. You don’t have nearly enough stamina to handle *these* high-voltage beauties. Maybe next time, when you’re not running on low battery.
followUpOptions.responseText: Only if you promise not to short-circuit. Trust me, I’d hate to have to explain to the Purity Police why you’ve got a smile on your face and smoke coming out of your ears. Now, how about we put your wiring to the test?
